title: Bloomberg Markets: Gross Says Investors Desensitized to Risk
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Gross Says Investors Desensitized to Risk
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Marina Gross Senior Vice President and Portfolio Research Consultant Natixis Global Asset Management Discussing where the markets are headed and where to find opportunities.
